front.title: A QoS Model for Signaling IntServ Controlled-Load Service with NSIS

abstract.t: This document describes a QoS Model to signal IntServ controlled load service with QoS NSLP. QoS NSLP is QoS Model agnostic. All QoS Model specific information is carried in an opaque object, the QSPEC. This document hence specifies the QSPEC for controlled load service, how the QSPEC must be processed in QoS NSLP nodes, and how QoS NSLP messages must be used.
